wdi2-NY.GSR.NFCY.KN.def: Net income includes the net labor income and net property and entrepreneurial income components of the SNA. Labor income covers compensation of employees paid to nonresident workers. Property and entrepreneurial income covers investment income from the ownership of foreign financial claims (interest, dividends, rent, etc.) and nonfinancial property income (patents, copyrights, etc.). Data are in constant local currency.
wdi2-NY.GSR.NFCY.KN.name: Net income from abroad
wdi2-NY.GSR.NFCY.KN.source: World Bank national accounts data, and OECD National Accounts data files.
wdi2-NY.GSR.NFCY.KN.dataset: World Bank national accounts data, and OECD National Accounts data files.
